name: short_offer
description: Present a shortened WebRTC offer.  Fully tested, typescript double-parser.

scripts.clean: rimraf -f docs && mkdir docs && cd docs && mkdir docs && cd .. && rimraf -f build && mkdir build && cd build && mkdir pegjs && mkdir typescript && mkdir rollup && mkdir terser && cd ../src/ts && rimraf -f generated_code && mkdir generated_code && cd ../..
scripts.pegjs: pegjs -o src/ts/generated_code/sdp_parser.js --format commonjs src/peg/sdp_parser.pegjs && pegjs -o src/ts/generated_code/decompiler.js --format commonjs src/peg/decompiler.pegjs
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run pegjs && npm run typescript && npm run rollup && npm run site && npm run test && npm run report
